org.epochx.gp.op.mutation
Class SubtreeMutation

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.op.ConfigOperator<GPModel>
      org.epochx.gp.op.mutation.SubtreeMutation
All Implemented Interfaces:
GPMutation, ConfigListener, Listener, Mutation, Operator
public class SubtreeMutation
extends ConfigOperator<GPModel>
implements GPMutation

This class performs a subtree mutation on a GPCandidateProgram.

A mutation point is randomly selected anywhere in the program tree. Then the node at that point is replaced with a newly generated program tree, which is created using a grow strategy.

If a model is provided then the following parameters are loaded upon every configure event:

  • random number generator
  • syntax

If the getModel method returns null then no model is set and whatever static parameters have been set as parameters to the constructor or using the standard accessor methods will be used. If any compulsory parameters remain unset when the mutation is performed then an IllegalStateException will be thrown.

Field Summary
static Stat MUT_POINT
          Requests an Integer which is the point which was modified as a result of the subtree mutation operation.
static Stat MUT_SUBTREE
          Requests a Node which is the subtree that was inserted in the program undergoing subtree mutation.

Method Detail

onConfigure

public void onConfigure()
Description copied from class: ConfigOperator
Configures the operator with parameters from the model. This method will be called at the appropriate times to configure this component. Implementing classes should override this method to setup the operator with any parameters required from the model. If no model is set then this instance will not be subscribed to configure events and so alternative means must be used to configure it.

Specified by:
onConfigure in interface ConfigListener
Overrides:
onConfigure in class ConfigOperator<GPModel>

mutate

public GPCandidateProgram mutate(CandidateProgram p)
Perform subtree mutation on the given GPCandidateProgram. A mutation point is randomly selected anywhere in the program tree. Then the node at that point is replaced with a newly generated program tree, which is created using a grow strategy.

Specified by:
mutate in interface GPMutation
Specified by:
mutate in interface Mutation
Parameters:
p - The GPCandidateProgram selected to undergo this mutation operation.
Returns:
A GPCandidateProgram that was the result of a point mutation on the provided GPCandidateProgram.

getRNG

public RandomNumberGenerator getRNG()
Returns the random number generator that this mutation is using or null if none has been set.

Returns:
the rng the currently set random number generator.

setRNG

public void setRNG(RandomNumberGenerator rng)
Sets the random number generator to use. If a model has been set then this parameter will be overwritten with the random number generator from that model on the next configure event.

Parameters:
rng - the random number generator to set.

getMaxSubtreeDepth

public int getMaxSubtreeDepth()
Returns the maximum depth that the new subtrees being inserted into the program may be.

Returns:
an int which is the maximum subtree depth that will be generated.

setMaxSubtreeDepth

Sets the maximum depth to use for new subtrees being inserted into programs by this mutation.

Parameters:
